DOC.brief_summary: This Phase III clinical trial examine safety , tolerability , efficacy addition MK-0431/ONO-5435 Japanese patient Type 2 Diabetes mellitus inadequate glycemic control diet/exercise therapy rapid-acting insulin secretagogue monotherapy .
